BVR kill chain: Single/two-seat with Raven ES-05 AESA radar (250 km detection), fly-by-wire, and 4-6 Meteor/AIM-120D missiles for high-Pk BVR; MS20 upgrades (complete 2025) add AI targeting; F 7 Skaraborg at Såtenäs, excels in networked ops with Erieye cueing to 150 km envelope; supports two-ship formations and ELINT fusion; integrated with Gripen E for hybrid NATO exercises. F2T2EA: PS-05/A Find/Fix; Tracks integrated; Targets Meteor/AIM-120; Engage from stations; Assess lightweight ops.
Associated products: Meteor long-range BVR missile, AIM-120D AMRAAM, PS-05/A Mk 4 AESA

BVR kill chain: Indigenous turbojet trainer with light attack capability, upgraded avionics (2025 mods add datalink), and 2-4 pylon loads for AIM-9/BVR-lite roles; supports Gripen conversion and secondary CAS; F 7/F 10 at Såtenäs/Ångelholm, enables cost-effective networked training for 120 km simulated envelopes via Erieye cueing. F2T2EA: Upgraded avionics Find; Tracks datalink; Targets AIM-9/BVR-lite; Engage training; Assess networked.

Erieye AESA radar (450 km horizon) for off-board targeting and mid-course Meteor updates; sole operational unit post-Ukraine donation; F 17 at Kallinge, critical kill-chain enabler for Gripen salvos in Baltic theater. F2T2EA: Erieye AESA Find/Fix horizon; Tracks off-board; Targets Meteor updates; Engage directed; Assess enabler.
Associated products: Erieye AESA radar, Meteor long-range BVR missile

BVR kill chain: Advanced AEW with Erieye ER AESA (550 km) for extended cueing and missile guidance; first delivery 2027, replacing Saab 340; enhances BVR to 170 km with multi-domain fusion for Gripen E ops. F2T2EA: Erieye ER AESA Find/Fix extended; Tracks cueing; Targets missile guidance; Engage fusion; Assess multi-domain.

ELINT suite (300 km sensors) for enemy radar detection/jamming, enabling BVR "permission to shoot"; F 17 at Kallinge, supports Gripen by degrading IADS in contested airspace. F2T2EA: ELINT suite Find threats; Tracks detection/jamming; Targets IADS; Engage degraded; Assess contested.

C-130H variant with probe refueling for 1.5+ hour BVR extensions on Gripen; sole tanker at F 16 Uppsala, enables sustained patrols despite limited numbers, integrated with Erieye for Arctic ops. F2T2EA: Probe refueling extends Track/Engage; Sustains patrols; Targets Arctic; Assess integrated.

MRTT with boom/probe for 3+ hour BVR sustainment; 2 slots in multinational fleet (8 nations); supports Gripen interoperability in NATO exercises, extending envelopes to 150 km. F2T2EA: Boom/probe sustained Engage; Extends envelopes; Targets interoperability; Assess NATO.

Next-gen single/two-seat with PS-05/A Mk4 AESA radar (300 km detection), internal bays for 6 Meteor/AIM-120D, and AI autonomy for hybrid ops; first deliveries 2025, ramping to 60 by 2030; enhances BVR to 200 km with GlobalEye cueing. F2T2EA: PS-05/A Find/Fix; Tracks integrated; Targets Meteor/AIM-120; Engage from stations; Assess lightweight ops.
Associated products: Meteor long-range BVR missile, AIM-120D AMRAAM, PS-05/A Mk 4 AESA

BVR kill chain: AESA-equipped concept for Gripen E sensor relay and missile truck; development for swarm ops, first demonstrator 2026. F2T2EA: Concept AESA for Find; Tracks Gripen stations; Targets Meteor/AIM-120; Engage wing-mounted; Assess concept validation.
Associated products: JAS-39E/F Gripen, Meteor long-range BVR missile, PS-05/A Mk 4 AESA
